org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.plain

Class DocValuesIndexFieldData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.plain.DocValuesIndexFieldData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryDVIndexFieldData, BinaryDVNumericIndexFieldData, BytesBinaryDVIndexFieldData, GeoPointBinaryDVIndexFieldData, NumericDVIndexFieldData, SortedNumericDVIndexFieldData, SortedSetDVOrdinalsIndexFieldData

    public abstract class DocValuesIndexFieldData
extends Object
    IndexFieldData impl based on Lucene's doc values. Caching is done on the Lucene side.
